metas.name: Klaus
metas.description: A heartwarming animated Christmas story with beautiful animation and a touching message.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Epic adventure with a strong friendship theme and fantastic animation, similar to the fantasy and adventure elements they enjoy.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the exciting adventure and emotional journey of Hiccup and Toothless, with stunning visuals.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The visually spectacular conclusion to the beloved dragon saga, offering adventure and heartwarming moments.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical adventure with a strong female lead and impressive animation, similar to Disney's Tangled and Coco.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A magical and musical animated film with a focus on family and stunning visuals, echoing the themes of Coco and Sing.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and visually unique animated adventure about a quirky family on a road trip that turns into a robot apocalypse rescue mission.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: A visually groundbreaking animated film with a fun adventure and engaging characters, appealing to the action and animation they liked in The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A charming live-action comedy about a polite bear and his adventures in London, similar in warmth and humor to Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: An even more delightful and funny sequel that continues the heartwarming adventures of Paddington Bear.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: A charming animated film about a rat who dreams of becoming a chef, filled with humor and a touch of whimsy.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: A fast-paced and hilariously funny animated comedy with memorable characters and a unique story.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A clever and funny stop-motion animated adventure about chickens trying to escape a farm, in the spirit of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: The Pirates! In Band of Misfits
metas.description: A zany and funny stop-motion animated adventure from the creators of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A beautifully animated French film about an unlikely friendship between a bear and a mouse, with a gentle fantasy feel like Ponyo.

metas.name: Mary and the Witch's Flower
metas.description: From Studio Ponoc (formed by former Ghibli animators), this film has a similar magical feel to Ponyo and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: Whisper of the Heart
metas.description: A gentle and inspiring animated film from Studio Ghibli about a young girl's dreams and passions.

metas.name: Kiki's Delivery Service
metas.description: Another enchanting Studio Ghibli film about a young witch finding her way in the world, with a similar fantasy adventure feel.

metas.name: Castle in the Sky
metas.description: An exciting animated adventure from Studio Ghibli with a sense of wonder and discovery.

metas.name: Spies in Disguise
metas.description: An animated spy comedy with plenty of action and humor, similar to the comedic adventure of Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Abominable
metas.description: An animated adventure about a young girl who discovers a Yeti and embarks on a journey to reunite him with his family.

metas.name: Smallfoot
metas.description: A fun animated adventure that flips the Bigfoot legend on its head, with catchy music and a positive message.

metas.name: The Lego Movie
metas.description: An incredibly creative and funny animated film with a surprisingly deep message about individuality and teamwork.

metas.name: The Lego Batman Movie
metas.description: A hilarious and action-packed animated spin-off that parodies superhero tropes with wit and style.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A funny and heartwarming animated film with memorable characters and a story about an unlikely family.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Continues the comedic adventures of Gru and the Minions with more gadgets and family fun.

metas.name: Despicable Me 3
metas.description: More silliness and adventure with Gru, Lucy, and the Minions.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
metas.description: A wildly inventive and funny animated film about an inventor whose food machine goes haywire.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
metas.description: Continues the chaotic and food-themed adventures with even more imaginative creatures.

metas.name: Aladdin
metas.description: A classic Disney animated musical adventure with humor, romance, and fantastic songs.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical with a strong heroine, jazz music, and a touch of magic.

metas.name: Wreck-It Ralph
metas.description: A creative animated adventure set in the world of video games, with a heartwarming story about friendship.

metas.name: Ralph Breaks the Internet
metas.description: Follows Ralph and Vanellope into the vast world of the internet for a new, exciting adventure.

metas.name: Shrek
metas.description: A hilarious and subversive animated fairy tale that's funny for all ages.

metas.name: Shrek 2
metas.description: A popular and witty sequel that expands on the characters and humor of the original.

metas.name: Madagascar
metas.description: A funny and energetic animated adventure about zoo animals who end up in the wild.

metas.name: Kung Fu Panda 2
metas.description: More martial arts action and heartwarming comedy from Po and the Furious Five.

metas.name: Kung Fu Panda 3
metas.description: Po finally meets his biological father and learns the joys of being a panda, with exciting new challenges.

metas.name: The Incredibles
metas.description: A fantastic animated superhero adventure with humor, action, and a strong family dynamic.

metas.name: The Incredibles 2
metas.description: The Parr family returns for another action-packed and hilarious mission, balancing superheroics with family life.
